headline: SPECTRUM TV APP LAUNCHES ON LG AND VIZIO SMART TVS
summary: Spectrum today announced the launch of the Spectrum TV App on LG and VIZIO smart TVs, expanding availability of the popular app to additional devices and providing customers with even more ways to access its programming.
